amendment.description: An amendment numbered 42 printed in House Report 115-259 to increases fossil energy funding to 2017 funding levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. McKinley.
